website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable burlap sacks with an aesthetically pleasing design.
pros: Durable burlap sacks have fun potato-themed designs
Tightly woven so they wont fall apart
24 x 40 inch bags come in a pack of 6
Not as scratchy as most burlap sacks
cons: Burlap has a strong scent, air your sacks out before use

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These sacks are perfect for all ages. I used them for a birthday party game. They worked great for all of the kids, age 4 - 15. They are of great quality, not cheaply made. I am very happy with my purchase. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica1985

customer_reviews.title: They are very thick and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags as flower pots. I placed a 64 qt bag of potting soil in 3 of them and cut the top out of the bag planted flowers in it I turned down a couple of inches on the sack and tied it with jute string. I have had so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw5boys

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very afraid to purchase it because of the bad reviews I seen. Unfortunately they were extremely wrong. my product did not have a strong smell that was unable to get rid of. It had a strong odor. I let it sit outside for about 3 hours and it was gone. It was very durable. I got the value for my money. it was very strong. we had children weighing from 50 lb up to 160 and it stood the test of time. We really enjoyed ourselves and we will purchase more later. Shipping was free and the product nor the products box was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turner

customer_reviews.title: Hop hop fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness. I threw an outdoor party for my daughter and her friends! All we were missing was the AstroTurf and Partridge Family soundtrack. I wanted to show my kids the proper way to hop in these, so I stepped into this roomy bag and started hopping with great enthusiasm under our tree. Ooops! I bounced so high, my forehead crashed into a sharp branch protrusion! All the party kids stared at me stunned, while blood gushed out of my forehead, haha! Still a great product, and now we know not to hop under trees, and that the bag will keep you nestled, if you biff it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: High solvent smell, sparse woven, hard textured
customer_reviews.text: Almost a real patato bag. When i opened the box o got high volume solvent smell. And it still continous to smell (also now my hands). I hope this solvent is not harming type for children. It has hard texture. It would be good if soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nympis

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: They had a scent maybe from the paint used . I sprayed them with febreeze a few times, sat them out in the sun to get rid of the odor. Also the strings seemed loosely tied, I just tightened all the corners where they're tied and the sacks held up.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: The bags were large and durable but the chemical smell was so overpowering and they shed burlap terribly. I washed them hoping the smell would go down and left them outside in the sun and breeze and they are so strong with chemicals you can't even touch them. They say non-toxic, so i'm curious what the toxic smell is from.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vernier

customer_reviews.title: So much better than other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bags originally from another company on Amazon. When I received them they were terrible. You couldn’t read any of the bags and they smelled. These bags are amazing compared to those! They had a slight odor, but after I aired them out for a day it was gone. You can actually read the print on the bags. We haven’t used them yet to test there durability, but they seem like they are strong.
customer_reviews.author: Launa.

customer_reviews.title: Really big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Large enough for adults to use. I bought them for my 4 year olds birthday party and they are way too big for her, but we folded them down and made them work. They are great for older kids (12 and up) and adults though, and super cute with the numbers on them
customer_reviews.author: amy kanuck

customer_reviews.title: Fun potted plant container
customer_reviews.text: We lined then with heavy duty plastic bags and filled with potting mix. A great light weight and affordable container for potted plants. (We also added a water collection saucer and gathered the top with thick twine) They are holding up well and look fun
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Great burlap bags
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun! Happy hours racing with this burlap bags. The only con is the smell, really terrible even after washing them. Anyway, great different design and style for each racer. It was a successful game item.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Need cute sacks? Here they are
customer_reviews.text: Did the job and held up well for a 7 year old’s carnival-themed birthday party. Air then out for a few days if possible to reduce the burlap smell.
customer_reviews.author: MGB

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.text: We have used these time and time again. I bought so adults and kids could use. They have packages of smaller sacks for same price but that precludes adults from participating. So this was a better decision. Will not being disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty burlap Easter potato Sacks.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is tightly woven and very well made. My daughter had a lot of fun playing outside. Best way to burn down some energy. Perfect racing game. Fun and durable
customer_reviews.author: Renyin Mao

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my daughters birthday party to keep the kids occupied. The kids loved them and the bags held up perfectly. They were the cheapest 6 pack I could find that also seemed like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Fun Filled!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's birthday and I must say that the kiddies and the adults had a blast. They were perfect for the occasion before and in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha pate

customer_reviews.title: Birthday party
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for games at my son's birthday party. About half the kids liked doing the race, half not, but at least they got used.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Steinlicht

customer_reviews.title: Great but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for sack races but they are pretty smelly. We had kids and adults using them perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was used for sack races at school by over 200 students and they held up perfectly! They'll be used for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: KrKing

customer_reviews.title: Great in the garden!
customer_reviews.text: Using to grow a few veggies and flowers around my tiny raised bed. They're working out nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Keeley and Jack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute - but they really shed!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really cute, but I didn’t use them. They had an odd smell, are REALLY tall if using with kids, and they shed burlap like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: JYD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing some of there’s had holes on the bottom not good quality not durable
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Printing isn't straight
customer_reviews.text: Bags seem to be great quality they feel very thick and sturdy. I actually purchased to use as part og decor in a home office she shed space and 2 of them are printed so crooked I cant use them. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carri-an

customer_reviews.title: sturdy backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: great outdoor play. Adults played weighting over 200lbs and had no mishaps
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pacheco-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Super great product
customer_reviews.text: These products seem to hold up very well and can sustain a good amount of weight. They are made well and the graphic is a great added touch.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent party game
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's farm inspired birthday party. They were a hit with the group with cute fun prints.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids did a race with their grandfather. Great family entertainment. Today was our first day, and we had already several inquiries about this fun item. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: very durable and machine washable. good to have around for outdoor events
customer_reviews.author: mazombel

customer_reviews.title: Potato sacks
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids and their friends have played with and they had a blast. They were tall enough for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Came in just as described. Love them! Already used them 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun to be had with these bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons party. They are well made and sturdy. Very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Just how it looks :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and it’s perfect for adults and kids ! Material feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for all kids any age
customer_reviews.text: Worked great !! Kids loved it for Easter get together and have used all through the summer for play dates always a hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do shed a little but it’s expected
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cool love these the kids had a great time
customer_reviews.author: Ale Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a party and was so pleasantly surprised! Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Sacks for races!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for sack races at a family BBQ. They came on time and are very sturdy. We had people of all ages use them. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD DELEON

customer_reviews.title: Sack Race 👍
customer_reviews.text: Adults and kids had a blast jumping across the finish line in these potato sacks!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey giardina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Adults & Children
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Sturdy and very durable. The kids and adults will enjoy these bags. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These bags are hugh.. adults could use them. Need to found down for little jumpers. Super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: E Rey

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These were good size bags that an adult or a child could fit in
customer_reviews.author: DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our western theme VBS. Very sturdy and durable. Kids from ages 3 thru 56 enjoyed them and the sacks endured the extreme abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Godsgood

customer_reviews.title: Best for Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Used for our Easter lawn games. Tons of fun & all age levels enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Daphney Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality and large enough for the whole family to move in comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Buonanno

product_meta.title: 6 PCs Burlap Bags; 40” x 24" Potato Sacks Racing Bags for All Ages Kids & Family, Carnival Games Party Favor, Outdoor Game Activity, Outside Lawn Games Party Supplies Décor Props Decorations.
feature_bullets: Easter Race Game Playset includes 6 Pieces Jumping Burlap Potato Sacks Bags.
Superior Quality. High Quality. Size is approximately 40” x 24”.

Super Value Pack for Easter Games. Perfect for Easter Theme Decoration, School Classroom Supply, Easter Party Favor Supplies, Easter Basket Stuffers Fillers, Easter Goodie/ Goody, Easter Toy and Prizes, Teacher Treats, Easter Gifts and more!
Enjoy Burlap Potato Sacks Race Bags for Hours of fun at Easter Egg Hunting Party!
CHILD SAFETY: Meet US Safety Standard. Safety Test Approved. Non-Toxic. Superior Quality.
